mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM devops_merge_request WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND gitlab_merge_request_id = #{gitlabMergeRequestId}
SELECT * FROM devops_merge_request WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND state = #{state}
SELECT * FROM devops_merge_request WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND source_branch = #{branchName} ORDER by id desc
